description:
You don't need to share any space with random people. It's all yours - bathroom, kitchen, Queen bed, sofa, TV with all channels - just like a 5 star hotel. All attractions are within minutes - Bryant Park, New York Public Library, Time Square, Time Warner Building, Trump Towers, Shake Shack, AMC Empire 25, Port Authority Bus Terminal, Comedy Club, Empire State Building, Korea Town, Fashion District and all subway lines. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

You will have all access to entire apartment (bed, bath, kitchen, living area) without any interaction.

Restaurants , Bars , shows , entertainment , central park, I love everything about Midtown Time Square

All transit is nearby . Very convenient for transportation.
name: Times Square Best Location Studio (Entire apt)
review: Very clean, well maintained and very comfortable. The apartment is extremely central and perfect for people who want to stay in Midtown. JY is extremely helpful and forthcoming as a host. I would definitely recommend this to anyone
